intro: Aeschynanthus loheri, commonly known as the flame orchid, is a flowering plant native to western Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its striking, tubular red flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has heart-shaped, glossy leaves and thrives in humid, shaded environments. It is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its vibrant blooms and compact size. Aeschynanthus loheri requires well-draining soil and consistent moisture to flourish.
